intervention_catalogue.name: Building Choices: high intensity
intervention_catalogue.short_description: Building Choices helps people to develop skills for change and future-focused goals. It is a cognitive-behavioural programme, combining group and one-to-one sessions. It develops skills such as emotion management, healthy thinking, healthy relationships, sense of purpose and healthy sex. This is the high intensity pathway, including Getting Ready.
intervention_catalogue.long_description: Building Choices helps people to develop skills for change and future-focused goals. It is a cognitive-behavioural programme, combining group and one-to-one sessions. It develops skills such as emotion management, healthy thinking, healthy relationships, sense of purpose and healthy sex. This is the high intensity pathway, including Getting Ready.
intervention_catalogue.session_detail: 6 x One-to-one sessions 21 x Group Sessions

possible_outcomes: The aim is that this reduces the burden of ‘automatic demand’ on delivery teams and presents them with a more resource effective
way of ensuring those who are eligible and those who are the highest priority get the opportunity

risk_consideration.osp_dc_icc_combination_guide: OSP-DC or OSP-IIC (OASys Sexual Reconviction Predictor – Contact or Indecent Imagery)
